H0.text: Mass is the property that must be included with magnitude to represent a vector.

H1.text: Direction must be included with magnitude to represent a vector.

H2.text: Acceleration is the quantity that must be included with magnitude to represent a vector.

H3.text: Volume must be included with magnitude to represent a vector.

A4.text: Vector quantities such as displacements, forces and velocity have both magnitude and direction.

A5.text: Vectors can represent quantities such as displacement, force, velocity, not just mass.
